verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> on Neginoth <S%H5058><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Hear <S%H6030><s%> me when I call <S%H7121><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%> of my righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: thou hast enlarged <S%H7337><s%> me when I was in distress <S%H6862><s%>; have mercy <S%H2603><s%> upon me, and hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>.

O ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H376><s%>, how long <S%H5704><s%> will ye turn my glory <S%H3519><s%> into shame <S%H3639><s%>? how long will ye love <S%H157><s%> vanity <S%H7385><s%>, and seek <S%H1245><s%> after leasing <S%H3577><s%>? Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

But know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath set apart <S%H6395><s%> him that is godly <S%H2623><s%> for himself: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> when I call <S%H7121><s%> unto him.
Stand in awe <S%H7264><s%>, and sin <S%H2398><s%> not: commune <S%H559><s%> with your own heart <S%H3824><s%> upon your bed <S%H4904><s%>, and be still <S%H1826><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Offer <S%H2076><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and put your trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

There be many <S%H7227><s%> that say <S%H559><s%>, Who will shew <S%H7200><s%> us any good <S%H2896><s%>? LORD <S%H3068><s%>, lift thou up <S%H5375><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> of thy countenance <S%H6440><s%> upon us.
Thou hast put <S%H5414><s%> gladness <S%H8057><s%> in my heart <S%H3820><s%>, more than in the time <S%H6256><s%> that their corn <S%H1715><s%> and their wine <S%H8492><s%> increased <S%H7231><s%>.

I will both <S%H3162><s%> lay me down <S%H7901><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>, and sleep <S%H3462><s%>: for thou, LORD <S%H3068><s%>, only <S%H910><s%> makest me dwell <S%H3427><s%> in safety <S%H983><s%>.
